about_the_game:
In a world inhabited by humans, elves, orcs, and other races, a terrible danger looms — the Devastator, capable of destroying the entire world. But its inhabitants are unaware of the impending threat; only the Overlord knows about it.

The Overlord of Death does not aim to save everyone, but the world where he was born is dear to him. To stop the Devastator, the Overlord must unite four magical artifacts — the omnipresent spheres, which are held by the strongest representatives of this world’s races.

What will the Overlord do? Will he seize the spheres by force, negotiate, or use cunning? Collect the spheres, prepare for the final battle with the Devastator, and save this world!

The Overlord

Once a powerful warrior, betrayed and resurrected through ancient magic to become the Overlord — the Keeper of the Sphere of Death. With this new power and the ability to summon departed souls, the Overlord stands guard over his world.

A World of Might and Magic

A turn-based tactical RPG in pixel art style set in a fantasy world: play as the powerful Overlord and his team, each possessing special magical abilities, attack types, and unique personalities.

What Awaits You on Your Journey?

Utilize a wide arsenal of attacks and spells in battles. Level up your heroes, enhance their skills and abilities in the best RPG traditions.

Fight against representatives of different races: in your journey, you will face numerous enemies, including humans, elves, orcs, and others, each presenting unique tactical challenges.

What Else?

  • 8-12 hours of captivating gameplay;

  • Over 20 unique and challenging levels;

  • 4 races with their own abilities;

  • Various combinations of magical skills and artifacts;

  • Unexpected plot twists.

short_description: Stop the Devastator and save the world in this thrilling turn-based RPG! Play as the powerful Overlord and dive into a fantasy realm where every hero and enemy has unique abilities. Use combinations of attacks and spells to find the best strategies and defeat enemies from different races.
